title: You know, it is sad that I have to ask this about KaceyTron.
body:
You do realize she is 100% trolling and you are just being milked for money/publicity?

I thought we knew this, but I believe that we went backwards recently. 

I personally have no issue with her, I don't watch her... but some of the stuff she has done in the past has been pretty funny.

It just like a Twitch version of Sacha Baron Cohen, so quit getting angry and either find the humor in it or just stop watching/talking about it.
